title: Designing Social Media-Based Pedagogical Methods for Higher Education Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic science education and familiarity with social media usage
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing practical social media utilization strategies for in-service secondary science teachers to immediately apply in actual classes

learning_goals: Learners can select three social media platforms suitable for science curriculum classes and adapt them for educational purposes
Learners can create a design plan for social media-based discussion activities to facilitate collaborative learning
Learners can complete a project implementing authentic learning content linked to real-world science contexts using social media tools

resources: Mobile-friendly social media platform access rights
OER (Open Educational Resources) related to science education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
